caption.p: Summary of common themes in all of the identified radiomic-pathway association modules. Columns 1–3 display the module name, the number of radiomic features (nr), and pathways (np), respectively. Columns 4–5 hold the radiomic and pathway themes present in each module.

tr.td: Lipid and lipoprotein metabolism, Notch signaling, circadian clock
